title: Trini Lopez - Hilton special
creator_credit: Australian Television Network and Ron Way
brief_description: Television special featuring Trini Lopez and his band performing some of his international hits including ‘La Bamba’, ‘If I had a hammer’, ‘Unchain my heart’, ‘Kansas City’ and more. By arrangements with Harry M. Miller and Pan Pacific Promotions.
